vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(caddress.call(id, from, _tos[i], v)); // added require statement to check if the low level call was successful
vulnerability_findings.message:
airdrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v)) (patch_0.sol#13)
